content.body: annevk (or whoever): is the process that I should now go file bugs for https://github.com/whatwg/fetch/pull/1753 against the various implementations?
content.formatted_body: annevk (or whoever): is the process that I should now go file bugs for https://github.com/whatwg/fetch/pull/1753 against the various implementations?

content.body: bakkot: yeah, whatwg spec PR authors are the ones who typically raise the associated browser bugs for their spec PRs — unless somebody else has gotten to it before them
